Package org.jdesktop.swingx.error

Contains classes and interfaces used by the JErrorPane component.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
ErrorListener ErrorListener defines the interface for an object which listens to errors generated by a JX Swing component.
ErrorReporter ErrorReporter is used by JXErrorPane to implement a pluggable error reporting API.
 

Class Summary
ErrorEvent Defines an event which encapsulates an error which occurred in a JX Swing component which supports ErrorListeners.
ErrorInfo A simple class that encapsulates all the information needed to report a problem using the automated report/processing system.
ErrorLevel Extends Level adding the FATAL error level.
ErrorSupport ErrorSupport provides support for managing error listeners.
 

Package org.jdesktop.swingx.error Description

Contains classes and interfaces used by the JErrorPane component.
